sentences.en: A singleton is used comparatively rarely in application development.
sentences.cn: 在应用程序开发中,很少使用单一实例.

sentences.en: Alliott told Singleton he was passing the sentence prescribed by law.
sentences.cn: 阿利奥特告诉辛格尔顿他是依法判决。

sentences.en: As the singleton female longing and share experience experience with age person.
sentences.cn: 身为独生子女渴望与同龄人分享经历经验.

sentences.en: Bank is a 38-year-old singleton who grew up in Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 班克是一名38岁的单身汉，在费城长大。

sentences.en: Mr. Singleton wants to bet with you on the election.
sentences.cn: 辛莱顿先生想就这次选举和你打赌.

sentences.en: Since there is only one singleton instance, any instance fields of a singleton will occur only once per class, just like static fields.
sentences.cn: 由于只有一个单实例，单例对象的域只会在一个类中出现一次，就像静态域一样。

sentences.en: Singleton female easy and capricious, selfish, slack, feebleminded wait.
sentences.cn: 独生子女轻易任性 、 自私 、 懒散 、 意志薄弱等.

sentences.en: Singleton is at a loss, love also indecision!
sentences.cn: 失去了我唯一的你, 爱却又如此的优柔寡断!

sentences.en: Singleton was a fantasist who claimed to have a karate blackbelt.
sentences.cn: 辛格尔顿是个牛皮大王，他自称有一条空手道黑带。
帮我写封信，辛格尔顿小姐。

sentences.en: The Singleton pattern is used in the design of logger classes.
sentences.cn: 单件模式被用在日志记录类中.

sentences.en: They created the teenager , the yuppie, the baby boomer, the singleton and the metrosexual.
sentences.cn: 他们把消费者划分为:青少年, 婴儿潮, 单身主义者和都市玉男.

sentences.en: This class a singleton and cannot be created directly.
sentences.cn: 这个类是单立的,不能被直接创建.

sentences.en: This class handles all application interaction with a user. The class is a singleton.
sentences.cn: 这个类操纵着所有有关用户的应用程序. 这个类也是单件模式的.

sentences.en: This paper presents a prediction model of frequency parameters of short - wave communication based on - singleton fuzzy system.
sentences.cn: 提出一种利用非单点模糊系统建模的 短波 通信频率参数预测模型.
